conbody.p: The contracting officer shall insert the clause at 52.222-17 , Nondisplacement of Qualified Workers, in solicitations and contracts for (1) service contracts, as defined at 22.001 , (2) that succeed contracts for performance of the same or similar work at the same location and (3) that are not exempted by 22.1203-2 or waived in accordance with 22.1203-3 .
